title: Name variables
text: Let n $$=$$ the first number and m $$=$$ the second number.

title: Equations
text: We know the sum of the two numbers is 37, and that the difference is 9. Using this, we can create two equations. One is $$n+m=37$$, and the other $$n-m=9$$

title: Solve
text: Now, solve for n or m, and plug it into the equation to find the other variable.
